member.summary: Discovers the servers on the local machine.

member.summary: Finds the endpoint that best matches the current settings.
member.param: if set to true select an endpoint that uses security.

member.name: M:OpcUaHelper.FormUtils.Browse(Opc.Ua.Client.Session,Opc.Ua.BrowseDescriptionCollection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Browses the address space and returns the references found.
member.param: The set of browse operations to perform.
if set to true a exception will be thrown on an error.
member.returns: The references found. Null if an error occurred.

member.summary: Finds the type of the event for the notification.

member.summary: Browses the address space and returns the references found.
member.param: The NodeId for the starting node.
if set to true a exception will be thrown on an error.
member.returns: The references found. Null if an error occurred.

member.summary: Browses the address space and returns all of the supertypes of the specified type node.
member.param: The NodeId for a type node in the address space.
if set to true a exception will be thrown on an error.
member.returns: The references found. Null if an error occurred.

member.summary: Constructs an event object from a notification.

Mapping between event types and known event types.
member.returns: The event object. Null if the notification is not a valid event type.

The starting node for the relative paths.

member.name: T:OpcUaHelper.OpcUaClient
member.summary: 一个二次封装了的OPC UA库，支持从opc ua服务器读写节点数据，批量读写，订阅，批量订阅，历史数据读取，方法调用操作。

member.summary: 默认的构造函数，实例化一个新的OPC UA类

member.summary: connect to server

member.summary: Creates a new session.

member.name: M:OpcUaHelper.OpcUaClient.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects from the server.

member.name: M:OpcUaHelper.OpcUaClient.UpdateStatus(System.Boolean,System.DateTime,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Report the client status
member.param: Whether the status represents an error.
The time associated with the status.
Arguments used to format the status message.

member.summary: Handles a keep alive event from a session.

member.summary: Write a value on the specified opc tag asynchronously

member.param: The fully-qualified identifier of the tag. You can specify a subfolder by using a comma delimited name. E.g: the tag `foo.bar` writes on the tag `bar` on the folder `foo`
The value for the item to write
